title: Aliabad-e Jowhari
data: Aliabad-e Jowhari (Persian: علي اباد جوهرئ, also Romanized as 'Alīābād-e Jowharī; also known as Sa‘dābād)[1] is a village in Howmeh Rural District, in the Central District of Lamerd County, Fars province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 61, in 13 families.[2] This Lamerd County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
